author: cbs8
title: Ziegler Backs the Pack - Ziegler and the Green Bay Packers Give Back to Wisconsin
text:
Ziegler, a Wisconsin-born, specialty financial services firm, is proud to announce its partnership with the Green Bay Packers. Through this partnership, Ziegler Wealth Management will team up with the Green Bay Packers to host charitable and community events throughout Wisconsin.
Chicago, IL (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Ziegler, a Wisconsin-born, specialty financial services firm, is proud to announce its partnership with the Green Bay Packers. Through this partnership, Ziegler Wealth Management will team up with the Green Bay Packers to host charitable and community events throughout Wisconsin.
Ziegler was founded in 1902 when B.C. “Ben” Ziegler started an insurance business in West Bend, Wisconsin, making loans to farmers. Today, Ziegler continues its tradition of enhancing the communities we live in by financing hospitals, senior living communities, schools, churches and most importantly, advising individuals on their financial goals. Ziegler continues its strong Wisconsin roots with seven dedicated Ziegler Wealth Management branch offices throughout the state including locations in Appleton, Madison, Mequon, Sheboygan, Waukesha, Wausau and West Bend.
“Community – it may be a simple word, but it means a great deal here at Ziegler,” said Tom Paprocki, CEO of Ziegler. “Our shared commitment to community and rich Wisconsin heritage makes this partnership an ideal fit for our firm. We are excited to partner with the Green Bay Packers, bringing our two traditions together to give back to Wisconsin.”
More information to follow regarding the charities, events and community initiatives Ziegler will be supporting through this partnership.
For more information about Ziegler, please visit us at http://www.ziegler.com .
About Ziegler:
The Ziegler Companies, Inc., together with its affiliates (Ziegler), is a privately held investment bank, capital markets, wealth management and alternative investments firm. Nationally, Ziegler is ranked as one of the leading investment banking firms in its specialty sectors of healthcare, senior living, religion, and education, as well as general municipal and structured finance. Headquartered in Chicago with regional and branch offices throughout the U.S., Ziegler provides its clients with capital raising, strategic advisory services, equity and fixed income sales & trading, wealth management and research.
About Ziegler Wealth Management:
Ziegler Wealth Management provides individuals and businesses an array of solutions to help achieve their unique financial goals. Our experienced financial advisors have a responsive, personal approach to understanding our clients’ specific needs. Through traditional brokerage services, professionally managed accounts or financial planning services, our customized solutions encompass full-service financial advice and planning.
